data.name: ConfirmUserFolderDeletionMessageBeforeFolderName
data.value: Are you sure you want to remove the plugin folder
data.comment: NO trailing space, questionmarks or thelike. A space and the name of the plugin folder is added i.e. "Are you sure you want to remove the plugin folder "my plugin folder"?

data.name: UserFolderContentIsNotDeleted
data.value: The folder or the content is not deleted from your computer

data.name: AliasError
data.value: You cannot use the same alias for multiple plugin folders and the alias cannot be blank.

data.name: PathError
data.value: You cannot use the same path for multiple plugin folders, the path cannot be blank, you cannot add the main plugin folder in the game folder, and the path must exist on your machine.

data.name: InvalidGameLocationFolder
data.value: The game location folder is invalid. You must select the root folder (i.e. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Maxis\SimCity 4")

data.name: SelectGameLocation
data.value: (Click browse to select the games folder)

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToUninstall
data.value: Are you sure you want to uninstall {0}?
data.comment: {0} will be replaced with the name of the plugin

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToInstallTheSelectedPlugins
data.value: Are you sure you want to install the selected {0} plugins?
data.comment: {0} will be replaced with the number of plugins (minimum value is 1)

data.name: WouldYouLikeToEnterInformationAboutThePlugin
data.value: Would you like to enter information about the plugin?

data.name: ThisFormContainsNumExecutableFiles
data.comment: {0} will be replaced with the number of executable files

data.name: DoYouWantToRunTheNamExecutable
data.value: Do you want to run the {0} executable? Please note that the installer has to be installed in the plugin folder {1} in order to detect filechanges, otherwise you have to rescan the plugin folders manually.
data.comment: {0} will be replaced with the name of the file (i.e. "Install_BSC_Essentials.exe"), {1} will be replaced with the path of the plugin folder (i.e. "C:\users\myUser\Documents\SimCity 4\Plugins")

data.name: ItSeemsLikeTheInstallationDidNotStart
data.value: It seems like the installation did not start. If it did start then DO NOT CLOSE THIS DIALOG untill the installation is complete.

data.name: ThePluginDigNotContainAnyValidFilesToInstall
data.value: The plugin did not contain any valid files to install. {0}
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by a paranthesis with a list of valid file extensions. i.e. "(*.dat, *.sc4model, *.sc4lot, *.sc4desc)"

data.name: InstallingPluginNam
data.comment: {0} will be replaced with the name of the plugin

data.name: NumPluginsInstalledSuccessfully
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the number of installed plugins (which installed without errors)

data.name: NumPluginsFailedInstallationPleaseReview
data.value: {0} plugins failed installation. Please review these manually as some files may not have been removed correctly during recovery.
data.comment:
{0} will be replaced by the number of plugins that experienced an error during install.
Should also notify the user that some files may have been installed so the user should check this manually.

data.name: WouldYouLikeToEnterAdditionalDetailsForTheInstalledPlugins
data.value: Would you like to enter additional details for the installed plugins (like name, group, description, download link etc?)? You can always do this later if you so desire.

data.name: YouMustSettheGameLocationBeforeYouCanUseThisApplication
data.value: You must set the game location before you can use this application.

data.name: ThisToolWillScanForAllNonPluginFilesAndRemoveThem
data.value: This tool will scan for all non-plugin files and empty folders and remove them from the plugin directory. Are you sure you want to proceed? (Files are moved to the recycle bin)

data.name: NumFilesAndNumFoldersWereRemoved
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by a number representing the number of files deleted {1} will be replaced by a number representing the number of folders deleted

data.name: NumMinutes
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by a number (minimum value is 5)

data.name: ThisWillRemoveNumFilesAndAtLeastNumFolders
data.value: This will remove {0} files and at least {1} folders (more folders may be found after the files have been deleted). Deleted files and folders are moved to the recycle bin. Are you sure you want to continue?
data.comment: {0} will be replaced with the number of files to be removed (minimum value is 0), {1} will be replaced with the number of folders to be removed (minimum value is 0)

data.name: ConfirmDeletionOfNonPluginFiles
data.value: Confirm deletion of non plugin files

data.name: NoNewDeletedOrUpdatedFilesDetected
data.value: No new, deleted or updated files detected.

data.name: InformationForNumPluginsWereUpdated
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by a number (minimum value 1)

data.name: LoggedInAs
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the username of the logged in user

data.name: UsernameHelpText
data.value: Your username (what others see and search after) on the site you entered above.

data.name: SiteUrlHelpText
data.value: The URL to the website where you have uploaded your content. (Enter only 1 URL, you can add more sites when your user has been created)

data.name: UserHasBeenCreatedYouCanNowLogIn
data.value: User has been created. You can now log in.

data.name: TheFirstTimeYouRunThisProgramYouMustRunItAsAnAdministrator
data.value: The first time you run this program you must run it as an administrator (Right click on the shortcut and select "Run as administrator" and click "Yes" or "OK" in the following popup box). From there on you can start it without administrator rights.

data.name: UnableToLogYouIntoTheSystem
data.value: Unable to log you into the system.

data.name: YouDoNotAppearToBeConnectedToTheInternet
data.value: You do not appear to be connected to the internet. If this is not the case you can still try to login.

data.name: ThisUserHasNumPluginsInTheCentralDatabase
data.value: This author has {0} plugins in the central database. Deleting the author will NOT delete this information. Users will still be able to search for these plugins. Are you sure you want to delete this user?

data.name: ThisAuthorHasNoAssociatedPlugins
data.value: This author has no associated plugins. Are you sure you want to delete this user?

data.name: YouCannotSpecifyAnEmptySite
data.value: You cannot specify an empty site.

data.name: YouCannotSpecifyAnEmptyUsername
data.value: You cannot specify an empty username.

data.name: TheSiteUrlIsInvalid
data.value: The site URL is invalid. Enter it in the format "http://www.example.com".

data.name: ThisAuthorIsAlreadyClaimedByAnotherUser
data.value: This author is already claimed by another user.

data.name: YouNeedToAddAtLeastOneAuthorInOrderToAddPluginInformationToTheCentralDatabase
data.value: You need to add at least one author in order to add plugin information to the central database.

data.name: YouCannotAddExecutableFilesToTheListOfPluginFiles
data.value: You cannot add executable files (.exe) to the list of plugin files.

data.name: TheFiletypeXIsNotRecognizedAsAValidArchiveFiletype
data.value: The filetype {0} is not recognized as a valid archive filetype.

data.name: ThisArchiveContainsNumExecutableFiles
data.value: This archive contains {0} executable file(s) that cannot be added to the plugin information list.

data.name: TheLinkToTheDownloadInfoPageAndTheSiteOfTheAuthorDoesNotMatch
data.value: The link to the download info page and the site of the author does not match. (i.e. You cannot add a sc4devotion download link for a simtropolis author)

data.name: LinkAndAuthorSiteDoesNotMatch
data.value: Link and author site does not match.

data.name: ThePluginHasBeenAddedToTheCentralDatabase
data.value: The plugin has been added to the central database.

data.name: Unknown
data.comment: displayed text for unknown plugin authors

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteThisPluginFromTheServer
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this plugin from the server? This will NOT remove the plugins from the users plugin folders.

data.name: ThePluginHasBeenUpdatedInTheCentralDatabase
data.value: The plugin has been updated in the central database.

data.name: YouCanOnlySelectPart1OfAMultipartPlugin
data.value: You can only select part 1 of a multipart plugin (plugin spread over more files like plugin.part1.rar, plugin.part2.rar). If you have already selected part 1 the program will automatically find the other parts and install them.

data.name: FileXSkipped
data.comment: {0} will be replaced by the filename of the plugin (i.e. largeStadium.rar)

data.name: UnableToLocateTheGameUseTheBrowseOptionInstead
data.value: Unable to locate the game. Use the browse option instead.

data.name: ThereAreNoNonPluginFilesOrEmptyFoldersToRemove
data.value: There are no non-plugin files or empty folders to remove.

data.name: NoneOfYourPluginsAreRecognizedOnTheCentralServerAndCanThereforeNotBeChecked
data.value: None of your plugins are recognized on the central server and can therefore not be checked.

data.name: UncaughtExceptionWouldYouLikeToOpenTheLog
data.value: Uncaught exception: "{0}". Would you like to open the log?

data.name: NumPluginsCheckedForMissingPluginsAndNoneWereMissing
data.value: {0} plugins checked for missing dependencies and none were missing. Note that plugins not known to the central server was not checked.

data.name: WouldYouLikeToScanForMissingDependencies
data.value: Would you like to scan for missing dependencies?

data.name: UnableToOpenThisReadmeFile
data.value: Unable to open this readme file. You can access it in the plugins folder after installation. The following error was returned "{0}"

data.name: CannotMatchPluginsAgainstDatabaseAsNoConnectionsAreAvailable
data.value: Cannot match plugins against database as no connections are available

data.name: DoYouWantToScanForAndRemoveNonPluginFiles
data.value: Do you want to scan for and remove non-plugin files?

data.name: ResolutionMustBeInTheFormatNumberXNumber
data.value: Resolution must be in the format NUMBERxNUMBER. I.e. "1024x768".
